Efficiency

On this page
Arc Browser

A modern web browser designed for efficiency and productivity.

Zen Browser

A minimalist browser focused on distraction-free browsing based on Firefox.

Text Blaze

A tool that lets you store frequently used text snippets with commands for quick access. Pretty useful in the era of LLM.

Keyboard Maestro

Automation software for Mac, allowing you to bind a variety of shortcuts to applications.
